fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: European Digital Therapeutics Partnership (DTP); Intend to participate in the European Commission's High-Level Expert Group on Artificial Intelligence
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Advocacy for use of wearable devices in clinical trials and at-home monitoring solutions, and the safe and clinically-validated processing and application of this type of information via relevant conferences, white papers, and blog posts.
goals__remit: To make the acquisition and use of continuous medical diagnostic information via wearable devices possible so that healthcare becomes more preventive (early detection of disease), predictive (better risk stratification), and personalized (ability to optimize treatment to the individual).
